column5: walmart here in town has stealth camo braid on clearence for 12 bucks,seems to be a good price compared to the other braids,anyone have  an opinion on this braid ? thanks
It's not bad but the braid is loose, IE at times you can flex it and see through it.  I like the regular moss green stealth better.
I'm not fan of spiderwire.  Powerpro or fireline would be a better option.  Spiderwire looses it's colour really fast, and as mentioned before, is "loose" braid.  I find it frays really easily..
Camo fishing line eh? Is it water coloured?  The Stealth isn't bad line at all in the higher pound tests.
I just bought a spool of the 50lb and spooled it up for the little guy. It seems like a descent braid and for 12 bucks about 8 bucks cheaper than power pro or fireline.
I like it, currently using 30lb test, and compared to Fireline Crystal, I like it better.
I like it for trolling for walleyes and of course using a 10lb floro leader its fine for trolling and stands up to regular abuse well good line for the money. Cheers
